data.message: Your new album better not have any gay Rihanna or Sia collabs

replies.message: It probably will.
gay & rihanna dont go well together men , she is the girl who makes gay nigga reconsider.
She's attractive but her music is the type Eminem used to make a mockery of
Na not her music , his flow & musicality used in & after MMLP2 makes him a mockery. remember Love the way you Lie ( Recovery) me too me too
Or pink. Or skylar grey. No more pop shit man! It's ruining you. Or any whack tracks like from the mmlp2! Rick Rubin was a horrible producer. Stick wirh dre. and get back to your roots.
mmlp2 was his wackest album to date. He should have just named it Recovery 2. It had way more in common with that album than anything resembling the first mmlp
Jeremiah Raustler Eminem haters out here lol😂
I love both Rihanna & Sia!
What lol
we want that Infinite , Slim Shady Lp , MMLP , The Eminem Show , Encore yeah we want that FIRE MARSHAL
Daniel Gebremedhn Encore wasn't that good though
So that song with dido wasnt "pop"? My name is was pop

That Marshall is forever gone. He's a hatchet man for mainstream hollywood, the left and record companies now. The fattest most old looking pussy on earth currently. I hate the new Eminem. Makes me wanna vomit
My name is and Stan had edge. Love how you lie and that other one are just faggy as fuck. That's the difference
He is changing hip hop with pop singers, this is Em not Shady. peace ✌
Encore "wasnt that good"? , Evil deeds , yellow brick road , RAIN MAN , Mocking birds , Toy soldiers?????????
Encore was a classic compared to post 2010 Eminem
triggered?, it is just a discussion of ems discography men
Cold Wind Blows, Evil Twin, Bad Guy and Fine line are the only listenable modern Eminem songs. The rest sound like an old man yelling at the top of his lungs about shit 20 year olds go through
you got to add Seduction , on fire & so bad tho
On fire is decent. Seduction sounds like a Kanye song. It's embarrassing
kanye west couldnt write or ryhme  on fire & seduction perfection if he really was "yeezus"
The beat and lyrics are technically good in seduction. But the lyrical content is not Eminem like. It sounds like something drake or Kanye rap about
A real fan is able to be honest and critical even if it is hurting the buttholes of the obsessed fans who think everything he has done is perfect.

I'll listen to revival once. Free on spotify. And if it's anything like his previous 2 LPs I'll never listen to it again. Just the name "Revival" and the brightly colored artwork associated with it makes me think it's gonna be full of top 40 bullshit. He'll probably have 1 slim shady like song on it and it'll suck because he won't rap with the same sarcastic rage he used to be known for. It'll be a faux shady song
